title: Aaron’s Staff Buds
summary: Numbers 17 describes how God confirms Aaron’s priesthood by making his staff sprout, blossom, and produce almonds. The miraculous sign ends the people’s complaints about who should lead worship.

faq.question: What did Aaron’s staff do that the others did not?
faq.answer: It budded, blossomed, and produced ripe almonds overnight.

faq.question: What was the purpose of this miracle?
faq.answer: To confirm that Aaron was God’s chosen high priest.
